browser.detection: try { return typeof Beamer !== 'undefined' && typeof Beamer.enabled !== 'undefined' && Beamer.enabled === 'true'; } catch(e){ return ''; }

Beamer.description: Beamer is a feature management platform that allows businesses to manage and share new product releases, feature updates, and bug fixes with their customers.

Featurebase.description: Featurebase is feature management software designed to collect, organise, and analyse product feedback, empowering teams to make data-driven decisions for building products that align with customer preferences.

browser.detection: try { return typeof flagsmith !== 'undefined'; } catch(e){ return ''; }

FlagSmith.description: FlagSmith is an open-source, fully supported feature flag & remote configuration solution, which provides hosted API to help deployment to a private cloud or on-premises environment.

browser.detection: try { return typeof DDC !== 'undefined' && typeof DDC.WS !== 'undefined' && typeof DDC.WS.state !== 'undefined'; } catch(e){ return ''; }

LaunchDarkly.description: LaunchDarkly is a continuous delivery and feature flags as a service platform that integrates into a company's current development cycle.

LaunchNotes.description: LaunchNotes is a platform that aligns teams with product development and release pipelines while keeping users informed and engaged with product updates.

browser.detection: try { return typeof noticeable !== 'undefined'; } catch(e){ return ''; }

Noticeable.description: Noticeable is a platform that simplifies product updates and company announcements while enhancing user communication and feedback analysis.

browser.detection: try { return typeof OlvyConfig !== 'undefined'; } catch(e){ return ''; }

Olvy.description: Olvy is a feedback management platform that enables user-centric teams to analyze insights, streamline product development, and keep stakeholders informed.

browser.detection: try { return typeof SPLITIO_API_KEY !== 'undefined'; } catch(e){ return ''; }

Split.description: Split is a feature delivery platform that powers feature flag management, software experimentation, and continuous delivery.
